name: gitlab-mcp
description: GitLab integration via MCP - manage repositories, branches, merge requests, pipelines, and issues through GitLab's REST API

prerequisites.description: Requires Docker and GitLab personal access token with API permissions
steps: Install Docker Desktop and ensure it's running
Create GitLab personal access token at https://gitlab.com/-/profile/personal_access_tokens
Select scopes: api, read_api, read_repository, write_repository
Set GITLAB_TOKEN environment variable with your token
Set GITLAB_API_URL environment variable (https://gitlab.com/api/v4 or your self-hosted URL)
